title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin takes a victory lap after Odell Beckham Jr and the Browns announce they are officially parting ways and why this relationship was never going to work long term. He points out why Zach Wilson was never going to succeed after he was drafted by the Jets. He also gives out his Blazing 5 NFL picks for week 9. Plus, Super Bowl Champion LeRoy Butler joins the show to discuss Aaron Rodgers' explanation and comments about not getting vaccinated. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
